shortdesc.p: Below is a list of the parts that come with the ice cream machine and a short description of each:
Below is as guide that tells users how to keep the freezer bowl frozen and how to determine if it is ready for use.

topic.title: How to Choose "Ice Cream" on Cuisinart ICE-60W

shortdesc.p: You've found Cuisinart ICE-60W in one of your class rooms. You're ready to eat some delicious ice cream. But first, you must turn the machine on and select your treat.

topic.title: How to Make Chocolate Ice Cream

shortdesc.p: If you want to make chocolate ice cream, then you've come to the right place. This task will tell you how to make chocolate ice cream using the ICE-60W machine.

topic.title: How to Make Vanilla Ice Cream

shortdesc.p: Once the machine in turned on and you've selected the "ice cream" option on the control panel, you're ready to make your ice cream. This task will tell you how to make vanilla ice cream.
Below is a list of the most common problems with the machine and how to fix them if they are encountered.
